name: simple-rest-service
description: Simple REST application built using @yggdrasil architecture.
author: David Lopez

scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run tslint && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.compile:test: npm run clean && npm run tslint:test && tsc -p tsconfig.spec.json
scripts.ignition: concurrently -c grey,blue -n compile,nodemon "npm run compile:watch" "nodemon dist/ignition.js"
scripts.start:dev: npm run compile && npm run copy:views && npm run ignition
